messages.subject: Re: The Secret
messages.msgSnippet: I ve heard wonderful things about it as well.  Next month it will be part of the Spiritual Cinema Circle movie distribution, so I am looking forward to
messages.messageBody:
I've heard wonderful things about it as well. Next month it will be
part of the Spiritual Cinema Circle movie distribution, so I am
looking forward to watching it then. It'll also be nice to have
around to expose my children to it.

Chris
Spiritual-Short-Stories.com

>
> It is an awesome movie and experience. It is great if
> you can watch it 30 days in a row to help reprogram
> your thoughts.
>
> Lynn

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The Secret
messages.msgSnippet: I have that movie and must come creeping from deep in lurkdom to say it has absolutely changed my life for the better by 100%. Now back to my lurkdom! Happy
messages.messageBody:
I have that movie and must come creeping from deep in lurkdom
to say it has absolutely changed my life for the better by 100%.
Now back to my lurkdom!
Happy Holidays everyone and...enjoy the bliss,
Tricia

wuweimama <wuweimama@...> wrote: We just saw this movie and have ever more been moved toward gratitude
of the abundance of the Universe. I mostly highly recommend this
movie!! http://youtube.com/watch?v=phL0RLKL8bc

It is magnificently empowering.

Pat







Tricia unschooling mom to Elijah age11 and Phillip age 6.

messages.subject: The Secret
messages.msgSnippet: We just saw this movie and have ever more been moved toward gratitude of the abundance of the Universe. I mostly highly recommend this movie!!
messages.messageBody:
We just saw this movie and have ever more been moved toward gratitude
of the abundance of the Universe. I mostly highly recommend this
movie!! http://youtube.com/watch?v=phL0RLKL8bc

It is magnificently empowering.


Pat
